comment: Delivery was horrendous, and the food tasted awful. Regret ordering from here.
Terrible delivery, and the food was inedible. Complete waste of money.
Delivery was abysmal, and the food was tasteless. Absolutely dreadful.
The delivery was average, nothing exceptional. Sadly, the food didn't live up to expectations. Disappointing overall experience.
The food was below par, and the delivery was just okay. Wouldn't order from here again.
Decent delivery, but the food was lackluster. Expected better quality for the price.
Delivery was alright, but the food was a letdown. Expected more flavor and freshness.
The food was fantastic, but the delivery was painfully slow. Definitely worth the wait, but be prepared for a long one.
Amazing dishes, but the delivery lagged significantly. I wish it had arrived sooner to enjoy it hot.
Delicious food, but the delivery took forever. The flavors were great once it finally arrived.
